company.story:
With Cherokee Home Inspection LLC, you are choosing a Certified Master Inspector who provides high-quality home inspection services to the Cherokee Village, Hardy, Ash Flat and the surrounding area. We take great pride in doing a thorough job and going beyond our clients' expectations.

Our home inspection experience is inclusive. We encourage you to join us during the inspection. However, we respectfully request you show up at the last hour of the (4) hours inspection. I will have a good idea of the issues with the home and we can go over them and I can answer any questions you might have. Having you with us on the inspection also gives us an opportunity to provide you with tips on home care and maintenance. For instance, you can learn how to change the furnace filter, turn off the water, gas, and electricity in an emergency.

A home inspection is valuable, but unless the experience is well-documented, most people won't remember all the important details. That's why we provide a comprehensive written report to serve as your guide for as long as you own the home. It not only describes the house components and their condition, but also provides insight into what improvements will be necessary, and when.

We use State of the Art Home Inspection Software, and your pre-inspection contract, along with your finished home inspection report, can be sent to you in an email, or in a text link, and this report can be sent to your real estate agent at your request as well. The agent can begin to make a repair request on your behalf based on the findings in the report. This software is great for the person working, that can't afford to take off work to sign paperwork. This fits today's lifestyle where everything is handled via your cell phone, or your computer.

Our report can also help you setup a home maintenance program to take care of one of the most significant investments most people make. Our goal is to ensure that you can live safely, comfortably, and efficiently in your new home.
company.mission: Cherokee Home Inspection LLC is committed to providing thorough, professional inspections backed by detailed, easy-to-read reports delivered within 24 hours. We inspect every home as if it were our own, reporting on all aspects of the property, both major and minor. We prioritize integrity, client education, and ongoing support, ensuring every inspection empowers our clients with the knowledge and confidence to make informed decisions about their property.
company.philosophy: I inspect every home as if it were my own, reporting on all aspects of the property, both major and minor. We encourage clients to attend the last hour of the inspection to review findings together and discuss maintenance tips for their new home.

values.title: Thoroughness
values.description: Every inspection is conducted with meticulous attention to detail, examining all major systems including roof, exterior, structure, electrical, heating, cooling, plumbing, insulation, and interior components.

values.title: Client Education
values.description: We take time to explain our findings in clear terms and encourage questions throughout the process. Our goal is to empower you with knowledge about your property.

values.title: Advanced Technology
values.description: Using state-of-the-art inspection software, thermal imaging, and comprehensive documentation with photos and videos, we provide detailed insights into every aspect of your property.

values.title: Prompt Service
values.description: Reports are delivered within 24 hours of inspection completion via email or text link, providing you with the information you need when you need it.

values.title: Professional Integrity
values.description: We provide honest, unbiased assessments to help you make informed decisions. Our goal is to report on the condition of the home, not to influence your purchasing decision.

promises.title: I WILL NOT BE AN ALARMIST
promises.description: I will provide objective, balanced information about the property's condition without unnecessary fear-mongering.

promises.title: I WILL EXPLAIN WHAT I OBSERVE
promises.description: Every finding will be clearly explained in terms you can understand, with photos and videos for documentation.

promises.title: I WILL RESPECT YOUR TIME
promises.description: Inspections are thorough yet efficient, typically taking 3-4 hours, with reports delivered within 24 hours.

promises.title: THE GOLDEN RULE
promises.description: I treat every client and every home with the same care and respect I would want for myself and my family.

team.bio: James Tubbs is a Certified Master Inspector with extensive experience in home inspection, construction, and restoration. He leads Cherokee Home Inspection LLC with a commitment to thoroughness and client education. James holds multiple professional certifications and is dedicated to helping clients make informed decisions about their property investments. His approach combines technical expertise with a personal touch, ensuring every client receives the detailed information they need.
